SyncTools.title: FTP/SFTP/SSH Sync Tool
SyncTools.secretKey.description:
Used to encrypt the username and password in the configuration to prevent account leakage. 

 ***Please note:*** Before changing the secret key, please decrypt the encrypted data in the configuration files of other projects, otherwise the decryption of other projects will fail! 

 [Click here to generate a random secret key](command:sync_tools.generateSecretKey)
SyncTools.confirmMoveOrUpload: Whether to confirm when moving or uploading files in the client view
SyncTools.config_desc:
No configuration yet. Please refer to [Configuration Instructions](https://github.com/oorzc/vscode_sync_tool/blob/main/lang/en.md).
[Add Configuration](command:sync_tools.addConfig)
SyncTools.gitignore.description: Whether to use the .gitignore configuration file to ignore upload content, default is true
SyncTools.excludePath.description: Files or folders that are not uploaded by default
SyncTools.logShow: Whether to display logs in real-time, default is true
SyncTools.logNumberLimit: Log number limit, default is 500. Logs will be automatically cleared when the limit is exceeded.
SyncTools.openFileSizeLimit: Prompt for opening files larger than the specified size, default is 5 Mb
SyncTools.uploadTaskNumber: Use concurrent upload when the number of uploads exceeds the specified value, default is 10
SyncTools.uploadConcurrentLimit: Upload concurrency configuration: Minimum concurrency is 1, maximum is 100, default is 3
SyncTools.proxyConfig.description:
[Configuration Document](https://www.npmjs.com/package/socks) 

 Configuration reference: 

 ```js 
{
   "proxyHost": "127.0.0.1", // ipv4, ipv6 or hostname 
   "proxyPort": 7890, 
   "proxyUsername": "", // Used for SOCKS4 userId authentication, and SOCKS5 user/pass authentication in combination with password. 
   "proxyPassword": "", // Used in combination with userId for user/password authentication of SOCKS5 proxy. 
   "proxyType": 5 // Proxy version (4 or 5). Use 4 for v4a, use 5 for v5h. 
}
 ```
